content.rendered:
With the coasts of Creek, Dubai tourist attractions come in two Sections-Deira as the northern side and Bur Dubai as the south and also as a best tourist place of Jumeirah.

Abras, the Conventional water taxis, works daily to take people from one side to another side of creek. Boths section are lying with public buildings, shopping malls, nice mosques , hospitals, schools, Hotels, office towers, banks, apartments, villas and busy souqs. Dubai is also gifted with silvery beaches and golden sunshine, international golf courses and as a future Sports City.

From the dateless serenity of the desert to a busy souk, Dubai is not merely the best present observation, but also retained certain of the most exciting historical attractions.

Tourist Places to Visit in Dubai

Dubai Museum


The year 1799 is described for building of Al Fahidi Fort. It was constructed to compete a foreign Strike. This wonderful strength today with Dubai Museum. So allowing visitors to see the rich culture and Inheritance of Dubai. The login of Dubai Museum is indicated by a vast collection of antique maps which are exhibiting cities expansion of Dubai from 1960 to 1980. Dubai Museum also provides a unique excursion to the wilderness life, mosques, traditional Arabian houses, fishing, gem diving and trade. The main attentions of Dubai Museum are artefacts from unearthed tombs and musical instruments.

Lethal weapons also forms main part of the Dubai Museum, such as swords, spears, shields, pistols,bows,axes and pistols. So, what you waiting for? Prepare yourself for thrilling journey to Dubai Museum and Dubai tour for your extraordinary experience!

Sheikh Zayed Mosque


Located in Bur Dubai side of Creek near the Mosque of the Grand Court was restored in 1998 and now, at 70 meters, the tallest tower of the city. It has 45 small the dome in addition to the nine main boasts stained glass windows, so that the distinguished landmark and important place of worship.

Heritage House


This jewel of the rich merchants of residence. Here visitors are offered a chicken, peas and tea, traditional snacks Emirates. The house was built in an old Bastakiya, was built coral and gypsum. Staff are very friendly and more than happy to do a tour of the rooms all overlook the courtyard.

Dubai Gold Souk


Dubai has long been known as the “golden city”, although most of the gold imported from Asia and neighboring countries. Dubai is a tax-free shopping a paradise for lovers of the Middle East and Central gold jewelry on the market. In addition, the gold in Dubai, the cheapest in the world.

Art Galleries in Dubai


Art scene in Dubai and the UAE has grown considerably over time and because it supports inheritance for its beautiful scenery, art galleries in Dubai, the world’s once again. Artists from different parts of the Middle East and other countries has shown his work in galleries in Dubai, which makes it stop, and the city really city to remember.

Desert Safari

The beauty and harmony from the desert is there to experience in the choice of exciting half-day safari, full day and night. This action-packed trips cover varied topography ranging from desert to the mountains and get remote camel and goat farms and individual villages.

Excursions in Dubai

Dubai city tour by bus to the city of Dubai will provide an overview of the ancient culture and heritage in Arab dress with a modern cosmopolitan lifestyle. You will experience a trip to the Abra (water taxi), the popular local form of transport that takes you across the creek to the spice souk and the glittering gold market Dubai, which gives the name “Golden City”.

Global Village Dubai


One of the most fabulous Dubai tourist attraction located in Dubai land, Global Village’s largest leisure, tourism and entertainment projects in the world. This is the first prime minister of culture, entertainment and shopping trends in the region, with different cultures, theater, art, trade and collection of dishes from around the world.

Parks in Dubai


Parks in Dubai is known as the best in the world. There are amusement parks and recreational parks and amazing gardens. All of them give a good environment that people can go to escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.

Beaches in Dubai


Dubai is endowed with beautiful beaches and the heat makes it nearly every day in the city is ideal for trips to the beach. The main beaches are at Dubai Jumeira Road.

Dubai beach activities, including scuba diving, snorkeling, water skiing and fishing, and there are many shops in the city where gear can be rented.

Ski Dubai


Ski Dubai has five runs of varying difficulty, height and tilt. The maximum period is 400 meters a drop of 60 meters. There are gentle slopes for beginners and internal black labor for more advanced skiers. Skiers and snowboarders being equally probable to Ski Dubai with snowboarders perform their actions on the length of 90 meters a quarter pipe.

Beach Resorts in Dubai


Seaside resorts in Dubai consists of buildings of extraordinary marble and glass with a garden, leading to a private beach. Some of them are also in a public place well-equipped, in a luxurious setting, for example, Dubai offers fine sand and hot sea, safe for swimming. Some good choices when plan your stay in a beach resort in Dubai.

Resorts in Dubai

Offering some exclusive stores in the world, except for the super luxury hotels, golden beaches and nightclubs, duty-free zone in Dubai is a haven for the buyer and a playground for adults. Resorts first-class service and world-class features and services, in addition to easy access to all attractions in Dubai.

Dubai Dolphinarium


Dubai to diversify is designed to create new forms of economic prosperity, in addition to the main source of oil. In an attempt to make this move, Dubai Dolphinarium is created and designed to provide entertainment, education, and the beauty of the environment for local residents and foreign tourists.

Fishing in Dubai


Dubai is a popular destination for fishing enthusiasts. Dubai hosted many famous sailors and fishermen. Deep sea fishing is an exciting operation is carried out in the water in Dubai and is a true blend of fun adventure. The warm Gulf waters abound with fish life, makes Dubai an ideal place for novice and professional anglers alike.

Aquaventure Dubai


Aquaventure is one of the main sights and famous in Dubai and is an ideal destination for the adventurous spirit. It is easily accessible, located in Atlantis Hotel Palm and resorts on the outskirts of the famous Jumeirah Palm Island.

Wild Water Wadi theme park


It’s wet! This is crazy! It’s Wild Wadi – Wild waterpark ever! This 12 acres of fun with 23 adrenalin pumping rides that allow you to breath more. Situated between Burj Al Arab and Jumeirah Beach Hotel in Dubai, a 20-minute drive away from the city centre. There and be nervous!

Wonderland Theme Park Dubai


Large indoor air-conditioned centre with arcade games, over 100 rides, video games and more. There is also a point for moms and dads to sit and get some rest. Enjoy a delicious meal at Cafe Nest Mithu, located in the heart of the city.
